feed.title: ARIA Lab
feed.subtitle: Research group at TU Eindhoven focusing on building trustworthy intelligent architectures for reliable and robust AI solutions, with emphasis on medical imaging applications.

entry.title: Innovative technologies make the industry safer and smarter

link.title: Innovative technologies make the industry safer and smarter

entry.content:
PhD researcher Tim Schoonbeek successfully defended his thesis investigating how AR and AI improve the quality of industrial processes. His research demonstrates how augmented reality combined with artificial intelligence can enhance safety and efficiency in industrial settings.

Congratulations to Dr. Schoonbeek on this significant achievement!
entry.summary: PhD researcher Tim Schoonbeek successfully defended his thesis investigating how AR and AI improve the quality of industrial processes. His research demonstrates how augmented reality combined with artificial intelligence can enhance safety and efficiency in industrial settings.
